Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice

Push events and Push operations: This package contains classes to create and send push events and to invoke push operations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractConfigurablePushOperation This class is an abstract implementation of a configurable push operation.
AbstractPushEvent This class is an abstract implementation of a push event.
AbstractPushOperation PushOperations that are triggered by the PushService must extend this class.
PushService This class manages all registered push operations.
 

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice Description

Push events and Push operations:

This package contains classes to create and send push events and to invoke push operations.

The core classes to push handling are:

  • AbstractPushEvent: An abstract implementation of the PushEvent.
  • AbstractPushOperation: Abstract implementation of PushOperation
  • AbstractConfigurablePushOperation: Abstract implementation of a configurable PushOperation, that can be registered via an extension point.
  • PushService: Manages all registered push operations and events.
